issue.title: [Format] [Rust] Generate flatbuffers files in build script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7003](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7003). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should generate the flatbuffers files rather than check them in.

comments.body:
